programme.title: Salvage Hunters: The Restorers
programme.desc: French polisher Alex restores a 1930s rocking horse. Sculptor Nick rescues a mid-century piece and upholsterer Craig attempts to restore a classic Victorian chair. S2, Ep7

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc: Simon O'Brien and Henry Cole visit a cluttered collection in Middlesex. They pick out a linen cabinet, a kitchen storage bin and a table with smoked glass. S2, Ep31
